column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Crystal - Thank you for your excellent review. First and foremost
column2: I regret the mix-up at the host stand when you arrived. Our hosts' job is probably the toughest -- and most thankless -- job in our restaurant
column5: hundreds of people every day. Just last weekend
column7: 000 people ate at JINYA over the course of 15 hours. Our hosts worked very hard to accommodate everyone in a fair and timely fashion
column8: and please keep in mind that JINYA has 89 seats. But
column10: mistakes happen. We are all fallible humans
column11: but we also try to fix our errors in the moments in which they happen.
